branchCategory.name: XT34
branchCategory.description: <p>The XT34-303 series of pilot operated check valve is a direct mounted model with threaded connections.  It features an auto switch for confirmation of the closed state of the valve.  This output can be used for a confirmation signal in a machine safety scheme.</p>

branchItem.name: XT34-303, Pilot Check Valve with State Detection
branchItem.description: <p>The XT34-303 series of pilot operated check valve is a direct mounted model with threaded connections.  It features an auto switch for confirmation of the closed state of the valve.  This output can be used for a confirmation signal in a machine safety scheme.</p>
